VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Zenith Enterprises relative to Ironclad Industries?
SRP.A: Zenith Enterprises is {above} Ironclad Industries in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total employee count?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Ironclad Industries}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total employee count?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {AstraCorp}.

VE.A: Zenith Enterprises's employee count in 1994 is {270.42} employees.

VE.Q: What is Ironclad Industries's Employee Count in 1991?
VE.A: Ironclad Industries's employee count in 1991 is {510.31} employees.

VE.Q: What is Meridian Dynamics's Employee Count in 1988?
VE.A: Meridian Dynamics's employee count in 1988 is {466.29} employees.

VE.Q: What are the employee count of Meridian Dynamics, Lumina Solutions, and Zenith Enterprises in 1989?
VE.A: Meridian Dynamics's employee count is {457.12} employees, Lumina Solutions's employee count is {436.16} employees, Zenith Enterprises's employee count is {410.67} employees.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Employee Count in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum employee count is {185.74} employees.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Employee Count in the area chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Employee Count level recorded for AstraCorp?
What is the lowest Employee Count level recorded for AstraCorp?

SC.Q: What is the average total Employee Count?
SC.A: The average total employee count is {2088.46} employees.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Employee Count go below 1934.55 employees? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {1707.66} employees in {1994}, {1537.02} employees in {1995}, {1742.95} employees in {1996}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Employee Count fall between 1983.78 and 2192.59 employees? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Employee Count exceed 2241.82 employees? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {2622.14} employees in {1987}, {2487.91} employees in {1988}, {2502.65} employees in {1986}.

NC.Q: Between 1989 and 1996, did the total Employee Count experience a larger or smaller change than between 1987 and 1989?
NC.A: The change in total employee count between 1989 and 1996 was {smaller} than between 1987 and 1989.

NC.Q: Was the total Employee Count in 1989 higher or lower than in 1994?
NC.A: The total employee count in 1989 was {higher} than in 1994.

NC.Q: Between 1989 and 1993, did the total Employee Count experience a larger or smaller change than between 1993 and 1995?
NC.A: The change in total employee count between 1989 and 1993 was {smaller} than between 1993 and 1995.

NC.Q: Was the total Employee Count in 1986 higher or lower than in 1995?
NC.A: The total employee count in 1986 was {higher} than in 1995.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Ironclad Industries} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {AstraCorp, Zenith Enterprises, Meridian Dynamics, Lumina Solutions, Ironclad Industries}.
